duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely maintain and display used equipment inventory.
Assist with the inspection and acceptance of inventory.
Exercise vehicles to assure equipment is roadworthy.
Record findings/data after exercising equipment and make recommendations for repairs.
Transport equipment about the yard ensuring the yard is orderly, organized, and presentable.
Perform light mechanical work and coordinate with local Ryder shops or 3rd party service providers for repairs.
Submit weekly equipment exercise data via Teams.
Support customer pick-ups and demonstrate customer focus.

education_certification.credential: CDL preferred or ability to obtain CDL.
